headline: What SLB (SLB)'s Long-Term Aramco Unconventional Gas Contract Means For Shareholders
summary: Earlier this month, SLB announced it had secured a five-year contract from Aramco to deliver advanced stimulation, well intervention, frac automation and digital solutions for Saudi Arabia’s unconventional gas fields, supporting one of the largest unconventional gas development programs worldwide. This win underscores how SLB’s technology and digital capabilities are being embedded in national-scale energy diversification efforts that aim to advance the global energy transition. Next, we’ll...
